thread.title: Re: WTH went wrong with Nicole Kidman’s clapping at the #Oscars?!
thread.title_full: Re: WTH went wrong with Nicole Kidman’s clapping at the #Oscars?!

author: FirstBoot
title: Re: WTH went wrong with Nicole Kidman’s clapping at the #Oscars?!
text:
Some people just got mean, however: Plastic surgery? Eyelid – hands coordination? #Oscars https://t.co/A0BdPD1Xn4 
Or maybe she was daydreaming? When the reveries take hold. #Oscars https://t.co/s5BYuKlW4U 
— Steve Mullis (@stevemullis) February 27, 2017 
It was bad, but not this bad: Nicole Kidman clapping is worst performance by a human https://t.co/8ghNmZHo2l 
— Seth Weintraub (@llsethj) February 27, 2017 
Flashback: She’s had trouble clapping before? From 2015: soooo, did nicole kidman just have a manicure or does she just not get the concept of clapping? #oscars2015 
— Barb Darrow (@gigabarb) February 23, 2015 Les Miles approves of Nicole Kidman's clapping motion … pic.twitter.com/aFqvaZc8a2 
— Sean Pendergast (@SeanTPendergast) February 23, 2015 
From 2013:
